I’m a PhD student at the Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology studying Quantum Spin Liquids, a subset of Frustration, a subset of Condensed Matter Physics.

=======

I’m a PhD student at the Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology Graduate Uinveristy studying Quantum Spin Liquids, a subset of Frustration, a subset of Condensed Matter Physics.

I would greatly like to thank Lee J. O’Riordan, (Github: mlxd), for conversations, advice, and the large amount of grammar checking this physicist needs.

For further reference

Interested in learning more?

  • Principles of Condensed Matter Physics- Chaikin & Lubensky
  • Condensed Matter in a Nutshell- Mahan
  • Inna Vishik on Quora
  • https://thiscondensedlife.wordpress.com/

Know any good ones? Let me know!
